data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 250 Elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brush Off
data.description: Increases your chance to Disrupt enemy magic by 10%.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your run speed by 50% for 7 seconds. If you use any abilities, this effect will immediately end.

data.name: Concussive Jolt
data.description: A great wave of concussive force knocks down all targets 25 feet in front of you for 3 seconds, inflicting 113 damage.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Convulsive Slashing
data.note: Requires Gift of Brutality
data.description: You continually slice at an enemy for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to 6 times and dealing 132 damage per hit. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Corrupted Edge
data.description: Gift of Brutality further increases your Strength and Initiative by 160.

data.name: Corruption
data.description: Corruption spreads to your target, reducing their toughness by 75 for 20 seconds and inflicting 141 damage.

data.name: Crushing Blows
data.description: While you are using the Gift Of Monstrosity, all of your hits have a 25% chance to remove 225 points of Morale from the enemy.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Cutting Claw
data.note:
Requires Gift of Savagery
Requires 9 points in Path of Savagery
data.description: Undefendable claw attack that deals 216 damage and reduces targets armor by 1000 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Deadly Clutch
data.description: Tainted Claw will now reduce all healing used on the victim by 50%. Additionally, you will be healed for 50% of the heals actually received by the target.

data.name: Death Grip
data.note: Requires Parry
data.description: Disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: Debilitate
data.description: A deliberate attack that inflicts 191 damage and Cripples your target, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Deeply Impaled
data.description: Any time you Impale an enemy, they will become 10% more susceptible to being critically hit for 15 seconds.

data.name: Demolition
data.note: Requires Gift of Monstrosity
data.description: A widespread attack that inflicts 138 damage to all targets up to 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Draining Swipe
data.note:
Requires Gift of Savagery
Requires 13 points in Path of Savagery
data.description: You quickly rake your target twice, dealing 108 damage with each hit. The victim will regain action points 50% more slowly for 10 seconds.

data.name: Energy Ripple
data.description: A large burst of power courses through you, dealing 1200 damage to all targets within 30 feet, knocking down all targets around you for 3 seconds.

data.name: Exhaustive Strikes
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy while Mutated, they will lose 40 Action Points over the next 3 seconds.

data.name: Faultfinder
data.description: Increases friendly ram damage by 2% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Feeding On Fear
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your chance to critically hit will be increased by 20% for 5 seconds, but you will also become 10% more susceptible to being critically hit.

data.name: Ferocious Assault
data.note: Requires Gift of Brutality or Monstrosity
data.description: Chaotic winds and daemonic fury combine to increase your Strength and Toughness by 125 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Flail
data.description: Swipes opponent for 133 damage. If Mutated, will hit an additional time for 108 damage.

data.name: Flames of Fate
data.description: Your target is engulfed in the chaotic flames of fate, dealing 900 damage and roots them in place for 5 seconds.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Forked Aggression
data.description: For 20 seconds, all damage dealt to you is mirrored back to the attacker with a 50% boost.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Brutality
data.note: Grants Gift of Brutality
data.description:
You are imbued with the Gift of Brutality, warping and twisting the flesh of your arm into a brutal blade.

While mutated, your attacks have a 25% chance to fill you with power for 5 seconds, making it almost certain that your offhand weapon will swing on every attack and increasing your offhand damage by 25%.

data.name: Gift of Monstrosity
data.note: Grants Gift of Monstrosity
data.description:
You are imbued with the Gift of Monstrosity, warping and twisting the flesh of your arm into a vicious club.

While mutated, your attacks have a 25% chance to empower you for 5 seconds, gradually restoring 1032 health and letting you shrug off your enemy's armor penetration.

data.name: Gift of Release
data.note: Requires a Mutation
data.description: Releases your current mutation.

data.name: Gift of Savagery
data.note: Grants Gift of Savagery
data.description:
You are imbued with the Gift of Savagery, warping and twisting the flesh of your arm into a savage claw.

While mutated, your attacks have a 25% chance to deal an additional 840 damage over 5 seconds, and reduce the victim's autoattack speed by 33%.

data.name: Great Fang
data.description: A mighty swing attack that inflicts 1200 damage to all targets 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Growing Instability
data.description: The power of Chaos begins to take control of your body, causing all of your critical hits to deal additional 50% bonus damage.

data.name: Guillotine
data.note:
Requires Gift of Brutality
Requires 5 points in Path of Brutality
data.description:
Requires target to be below 50% health
A powerful blow inflicting 316 damage and will almost always deal critical damage to a weakened target.

data.name: Gut Ripper
data.note:
Requires Parry
Requires Gift of Savagery
data.description: A savage attack that guts your opponent for 191 damage, and makes your next damaging ability within 5 seconds automatically critical.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Hulking Brute
data.description: Gift of Monstrosity further increases your Toughness by 160.

data.name: Impale
data.note: Requires Gift of Brutality
data.description: Stabs into your opponents vital areas for 166 damage. If behind your target, ignores 618 armor.

data.name: Insane Whispers
data.description: Mouth of Tzeentch will now disorient your enemies for 5 seconds, causing all of their abilities to take 50% longer to build up.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Lashing Power
data.description: For 20 seconds, each time you are hit, there is a 33% chance that the same amount of damage will be done to an enemy within 40 feet, and you will be healed for that amount.

data.name: Mouth of Tzeentch
data.note: Requires Gift of Monstrosity or Savagery
data.description: Tzeentch's dark words pour from your mouth, interrupting any spells being cast 40 feet in front of you, and inflicting 133 damage to all in range.

data.name: Mutated Aggressor
data.description: Chaotic energy surges through you, increasing all the damage you inflict by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Mutated Energy
data.note: Requires Disrupt
data.description: Disrupted Magic is twisted back into the caster, inflicting 241 damage and knocking them down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Mutating Release
data.description: Your bones and muscles twist and contort to free you from any root or snaring effects. You will also be immune from all snares and roots for the next 10 seconds

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Piercing Bite
data.description: All of your abilities which require a Mutation will now bypass 50% of your enemy's armor.

data.name: Pulverize
data.note: Requires Gift of Brutality or Monstrosity
data.description: Inflicts 241 damage and lowers your targets ability to parry by 10% and their ability to block by 10% for 20 seconds.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 Action Points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Rend
data.note: Requires Gift of Savagery or Brutality
data.description: You tear into your target, dealing 108 damage immediately and an additional 198 damage over 9 seconds. The damage over time will stack with itself up to three times.

data.name: Rend Asunder
data.description: Increases Rend's duration by an additional 6 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for 253 damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Scything Talons
data.description: Gift of Savagery further increases your Weapon Skill and Initiative by 160.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Siege Wrecker
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You sabotage a siege ram, causing the ram to deal 98% of the original damage for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Subvert Strength
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will regain 40 Action Points. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Tainted Claw
data.note: Requires Gift of Savagery
data.description: An Ailing attack inflicting 166 damage and makes the victim resist 25% of incoming heals for 5 seconds. If target is Ailing, they suffer the effects for 10 seconds.

data.name: Terrible Embrace
data.description: Extends a tendril of energy to pull an opposing player towards you. Monster targets will be dragged to the ground.

data.name: Throw Axe
data.description: Throwing axe that will deal 104 damage to your prey.

data.name: Thunderous Blow
data.description: A particularly nasty blow that inflicts 241 damage to your target and decreases their Wounds by 100 for the next 20 seconds.

data.name: Touch of Instability
data.note: Requires Gift of Savagery or Brutality
data.description: Target loses control over their magic, and for 10 seconds will inflict 232 Corporeal damage to themselves whenever they use magic.

data.name: Touch of Rot
data.note: Requires Gift of Monstrosity or Savagery
data.description: Spreads an agonizing rot to your opponent for 10 seconds, inflicting 125 Corporeal damage whenever they use a melee ability.

data.name: Tzeentch's Reversal
data.description: Melee attack that deals 1200 damage and returns all of that damage as health.

data.name: Tzeentch's Warding
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Unending Horror
data.description: Increases Wave Of Horror's duration to 15 seconds.

data.name: Unstable Convulsions
data.description: Convulsive Slashing now gains a 50% chance to remove an Enchantment from the victim each time that it hits them. Each time an Enchantment is successfully removed, they will suffer 152 damage .

data.name: Warped Flesh
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Wave of Horror
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are detaunted, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal against you to 50% for 5 seconds. During this time, all of your attacks will cause enemies to hate you 67% less than normal. If you attack anyone you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Wave of Mutilation
data.description: A wave of horror spreads forth from you, dealing 553 damage over 21 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet and reducing their Weapon Skill by 75 and Initiative by 50.

data.name: Wave of Terror
data.note:
Requires Gift of Brutality
Requires 13 points in Path of Brutality
data.description: Wildly lashes out at all targets directly in front of you up to 40 feet away, dealing 183 damage and preventing all who are hit from generating Morale for 5 seconds.

data.name: Widespread Demolition
data.description: Increased Demolition's radius to 30 feet.

data.name: Wrecking Ball
data.note:
Requires Gift of Monstrosity
Requires 13 points in Path of Monstrosity
data.description: Spinning in a circle with club arm extended, aimlessly inflicting 72 damage every half second to all targets within 30 feet in front of you for up to 3 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.
